originalTitle: Somali woman executed for murdering a child in a case that sparked outrage
title: Somali woman executed for murdering a child in a case that sparked outrage
content: Hodan Mohamud Diiriye faced a firing squad after being found guilty of beating Saabirin Saylaan to death.

originalTitle: Ethiopia PM hits out at Eritrea over atrocities in Tigray
title: Ethiopia PM hits out at Eritrea over atrocities in Tigray
content: Abiy Ahmed admitted for the first time in parliament that Eritrean troops had killed people in Aksum.

originalTitle: South Africa's ex-President Zuma mentioned in Epstein emails over London dinner plan
title: South Africa's ex-President Zuma mentioned in Epstein emails over London dinner plan
content: The correspondence describes arrangements for a meal and there is no indication of wrongdoing by Zuma.

originalTitle: ‘Extensive’ fire breaks out at Tehran shopping centre
title: ‘Extensive’ fire breaks out at Tehran shopping centre
content: No injuries reported after major fire breaks out at western Tehran bazaar, sending thick smoke over the Iranian capital.

originalTitle: Israel-Palestine head of Human Right Watch quits over ‘blocked’ report
title: Israel-Palestine head of Human Right Watch quits over ‘blocked’ report
content: Omar Shakir, who has worked for the rights group for more than 10 years, says he has lost faith in the organisation.

originalTitle: Celebrations erupt during Al Jazeera live report from northern Syria
title: Celebrations erupt during Al Jazeera live report from northern Syria
content: Cheers broke out during Al Jazeera’s Teresa Bo’s report as a Syrian military convoy reached a town in northern Syria.

originalTitle: Thousands of Epstein documents taken down after victims identified
title: Thousands of Epstein documents taken down after victims identified
content: The US Department of Justice faces criticism from victims after names and unredacted images included in latest release.

originalTitle: Clintons agree to testify on Epstein as vote looms to hold them in contempt of Congress
title: Clintons agree to testify on Epstein as vote looms to hold them in contempt of Congress
content: The couple previously argued that a House committee's demands were invalid. It is not clear when they will testify.

originalTitle: 'I was thinking about mum': Boy, 13, swims for hours to save family swept out to sea
title: 'I was thinking about mum': Boy, 13, swims for hours to save family swept out to sea
content: Austin Applebee recounts his 'superhuman' swim which saved the lives of his mother and siblings in Australia.

originalTitle: The talented playmaker no-one seems to want
title: The talented playmaker no-one seems to want
content: Harvey Elliott is one of England's most gifted young players - but neither Aston Villa or Liverpool appear to rate the midfielder.

originalTitle: Mateta faces uncertain future for club and country
title: Mateta faces uncertain future for club and country
content: BBC Sport looks at what next for Jean-Philippe Mateta after his dream move to AC Milan broke down over issues with his medical

originalTitle: 'Grumpy' Guardiola jokes about Man City spending
title: 'Grumpy' Guardiola jokes about Man City spending
content: Pep Guardiola mischievously said he is "a little bit sad and upset" that Manchester City have only the seventh highest net spend on transfers in the Premier League over the last five years.
